name: Panda for the Prosecution
description: This game, created for the Pandamic Game Jam, is more or less a visual novel, somehow inspired by the popular game Phoenix Wright. You are an attorney defending a bamboo stick, standing on trial for the treacherous murder of a panda - now pandom. Is the bamboo stick innocent? Has the pandom gone crazy demanding justice for his untimely death? Play Panda for the Prosecution and find out!
